entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider moving MAUI's Color type into the base .NET #16903
  • Entry is not unfocus when hide or close softkeyboard #16897
  • Toggling IsSpellCheckEnabled and IsTextPredictionEnabled should refresh red squiggly lines #16894
  • MAUI project iOS simulator startup failed MT7091 #16886

Closed

  • Maui (.net 7) Android (apk) Button behaves differently in Debug and Release. #16825
  • Windows TabBar Icons do not use the correct color #16575
    Backlog
  • iOS label within horizontalstacklayout overflowing container #12895
    Backlog
  • Contentpage is cut off in iOS #8778
    .NET 8 Planning
  • .net 8 preview 4 HotRestart prevents launching iOS app #15564
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Memory Leak issue in MAUI #15523
  • ItemsUpdatingScrollMode not working for Windows Platform on .NET 7 MAUI #16887
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.6.8686] Static extension can't resolve nested class references from class libraries #16293
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.4.8333] The launch screen of the app is not correct on android and iOS target. #15593
    .NET 8 GA
  • Maui app black screen in ipad (iPadOS 16.4) #14421
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • CarouselView doesn't scroll to the CurrentItem when set #7575
    .NET 8 GA
  • ScrollView.ScrollToAsync(x, y false) returns before scroll is completed (when #7295
    .NET 8 GA
  • WebView Navigating and Navigated Events not fired #14379
  • Translating object which has two parts x and y. Unable to find such option. #16884

PullRequests

Created

  • Fail the build before it even starts #16906
  • [UITest] Get the tabbedpage UI test working #16905
    area/testing
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc1] Updates for dotnet/runtime #16904
    .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] [macOS] Fix crash using Shell SearchHandler on Catalyst #16902
  • Handlers should not implement `IImageSourcePartSetter` directly #16901
  • Add .NET Foundation license file header #16896
    Under Consideration
  • [WinUI] Update shadow mask as part of shadow properties #16895
    .NET 8 GA
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp from 4.5.0 to 4.7.0 #16888
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Set Mapper/Handler ctor to protected on migration handlers #16882
    .NET 8 GA
  • Revert "Make ImageSourcePartExtensions public" #16893
    .NET 8 GA
  • [build] Manage extensions via maestro #16834
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Merge main into net8.0 #16876
    .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix ScrollTo method issues #15984
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area/controls 🎮, layout-scrollview, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • [ios] test MemoryAnalyzers package #16346
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • [windows] improve memory usage of `CollectionView` #16838
    area/collectionview 📃, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • [BuildTasks] Fix resolution for nested types #16841
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 GA
  • Bump Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset from 4.6.0 to 4.7.0 #16889
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Use the x86 emulator for API 27 #16869
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16872
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Fix issue setting CarouselView position on Ctor or Appearing #16165
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA

Updated

  • Add interface to expose out UIView methods #16868
    .NET 8 GA
  • Fix CollectionView not displaying header or footers #16870
    area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA
  • [core] use factory methods for registering services #16741
    area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 GA
  • [windows] Fixed CarouselView items rendering #16842
    partner/cat 😻, area/collectionview 📃, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix Flyout Crash (Windows) #16800
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-flyout, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • Wrap Image with a grid on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #15122
    area/controls 🎮, control-image, Under Consideration
  • Add property for tapping on page to close soft input keyboard #16530
    area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA
  • Fixed the tab bar not hiding/showing if property changed #16653
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • Tests: Add support for connected component analysis #16770
    do-not-merge, area/testing, community ✨
  • Add GetPosition method to DragStartingEventArgs, DragEventArgs, and DropEventArgs #16335
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • Enable Windows device tests on net7.0 #16756
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [iOS] Changes in Border clipping part #15856
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-border, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • Loading images needs the screen scale #14807
    area/image :framed_picture:, Under Consideration
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SearchBar #16383
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix the OnNavigatedTo event and the OnAppearing event to return the ScrollToAsync method call #16619
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, layout-scrollview, Under Consideration
  • Improve the control over resource generation #16845
    .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] Improve the customization of WebView on Android #16692
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Remove the explicit RID on Mac Catalyst samples #16765
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Default paths for Appium projects, to simplify run steps #16763
    area/testing
